dict.acceptation: 桩；刑柱；股份；（在公司、计划等中的）重大利益；
用桩支撑；以…下注[打赌]；用桩区分，界分；

sent.orig: STAKE As a partner, he a stake in that business.
sent.trans: 身为一个股东，他和那业务有利害关系。

sent.orig: North China Pharmaceutical hold 49 percent stake in DSM anti-infective Chinese holding company holds 51% stake.
sent.trans: 华北制药持有49%股权，帝斯曼抗感染中国控股公司持有51%股权。

sent.orig: China has as big a stake as the United States in a well-functioning, lawful trading system.
sent.trans: 中国在功能完善的法律许可的贸易制度中具有同美国一样大的支柱。

sent.orig: Some commentators argue that the government has a stake in preserving family farms.
sent.trans: 有些评论家认为政府保护家庭农场是有好处的。

sent.orig: I would stake my life and reputation on it.
sent.trans: 我以我的生命及名誉做保证。
